name: Proverbial
description:
A short puzzle game where the player is guided, or not, by proverbs.

Proverbial was created for the Myst Jam, hosted by Sophie Houlden. This is my first game and was developed for the most part over the course of two days.

Controls: WASD, mouse, spacebar.

Tools used include Unity 5, Blender, Audacity, MuseScore, and Paint.NET.

~a game by Darren Moore.
